tripleplay.util
Class Glyph

java.lang.Object
  tripleplay.util.Glyph
All Implemented Interfaces:
Destroyable
public class Glyph
extends Object
implements Destroyable

Handles the maintenance of a canvas image and layer for displaying a chunk of pre-rendered graphics.

Constructor Summary
Glyph(playn.core.GroupLayer parent)
           
Glyph(playn.core.GroupLayer parent, float depth)
           
 
Method Summary
 playn.core.Canvas canvas()
          Returns the canvas into which drawing may be done.
 void destroy()
          Destroys the layer and image, removing them from the containing widget.
 playn.core.ImageLayer layer()
          Returns the layer that contains our glyph image.
 void prepare(float width, float height)
          Ensures that the canvas image is at least the specified dimensions and cleared to all transparent pixels.
 void prepare(pythagoras.f.IDimension dim)
          Ensures that the canvas image is at least the specified dimensions and cleared to all transparent pixels.
 float preparedHeight()
          Returns the height of the last call to prepare(pythagoras.f.IDimension), or zero if the glyph is not prepared.
 float preparedWidth()
          Returns the width of the last call to prepare(pythagoras.f.IDimension), or zero if the glyph is not prepared.
 void renderText(TextConfig config, String text)
          Prepares the canvas and renders the supplied text at 0, 0 using the given config.

Method Detail

prepare

public void prepare(pythagoras.f.IDimension dim)
Ensures that the canvas image is at least the specified dimensions and cleared to all transparent pixels. Also creates and adds the image layer to the parent layer if needed.

prepare

public void prepare(float width,
                    float height)
Ensures that the canvas image is at least the specified dimensions and cleared to all transparent pixels. Also creates and adds the image layer to the parent layer if needed.

layer

public playn.core.ImageLayer layer()
Returns the layer that contains our glyph image. Valid after prepare(pythagoras.f.IDimension).

canvas

public playn.core.Canvas canvas()
Returns the canvas into which drawing may be done. Valid after prepare(pythagoras.f.IDimension).

destroy

public void destroy()
Destroys the layer and image, removing them from the containing widget.

Specified by:
destroy in interface Destroyable

preparedWidth

public float preparedWidth()
Returns the width of the last call to prepare(pythagoras.f.IDimension), or zero if the glyph is not prepared. The canvas should be at least this width, or null if the glyph is not prepared.

preparedHeight

public float preparedHeight()
Returns the height of the last call to prepare(pythagoras.f.IDimension), or zero if the glyph is not prepared. The canvas should be at least this height, or null if the glyph is not prepared.

renderText

public void renderText(TextConfig config,
                       String text)
Prepares the canvas and renders the supplied text at 0, 0 using the given config.

renderText

public void renderText(TextConfig config,
                       playn.core.TextLayout layout)
Prepares the canvas and renders the supplied layout at 0, 0 using the given config.
